root.name: AVSEQ
root.description: OverviewIn this game you connect so-called failing atoms to create musical patterns. According to the developers at Big Robot, there's 2.2300745198530623×10^43 possible audio permutations to discover. The puzzle elements lets you choose which atoms should be connected to create the best pattern.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP or betterProcessor: 1.6 GhzMemory: 2GBHard Disk Space: 150mbVideo Card: Video card must be 128 MB or moreDirectX®: 8Mac System RequirementsOS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or laterMemory: 2GB RAMHard Disk Space: 150mbVideo Card: Video card must be 128 MB or more
